title: Most Efficient Labor Services
description: In 2024, New Zealand achieved a perfect score of 100 in the adequacy of public services for labor, indicating highly efficient labor services.

title: Lowest Interest Rate Spread
description: In 2018, New Zealand had an interest rate spread of -3.26%, the lowest in the world, indicating a unique financial environment.

title: Fewest Tax Official Meetings
description: In 2023, New Zealand required only 1 meeting with tax officials on average for affected firms, the lowest globally, simplifying business operations.

title: Minimal Tariff Peaks on Products
description: In 2022, New Zealand had only 0.017% of tariff lines with international peaks for all products, the lowest in the world, promoting free trade.
